author: coheigea
msg: Add support to build the STS core if unlimited security policies are not installed

author: jbonofre
msg: [KARAF-786] Refactoring of the Karaf management modules. Improve Maven3 support.

author: jukka
msg: JCR-2272: Errors during concurrent session import of nodes with same UUIDs
Use ItemStateException instead of IllegalStateException to report ItemState consistency issues.
This avoids problem caused by unexpected RuntimeExceptions going up through the entire call stack.
TODO: We should be more resilient against such issues.

author: ate
msg: RAVE-171: a bit more generalization of the rave-portal dependencies, makes it easier for custom extensions to automatically incorporate these
